text: is a Japanese former cyclist. He competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics and the 1988 Summer Olympics and 1986 Asian Games. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Japan Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:People from Kōriyama Category:Asian Games medalists in cycling Category:Cyclists at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Japan Category:Sportspeople from Fukushima Prefecture
title: Yoshihiro Tsumuraya
